message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take a slightly larger share this time!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm getting more aggressive, you're not getting any younger!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but don't expect me to give up too much more. This is my final offer!
